Scorpyo/Blacknightmare/Thyphon/Elecktra/Chamaleon:

Chameleon was woke up and starting his duties, he went towards one of 
the labs. Scorpyo, Thyphon and ELecktra were drinking in Mess Hall


Blacknightmare asked to Ender "What would you do if you have in your 
hands a boss-enemy?"
